languages.text: "Ха-ха, подловил тебя, старушка!" — прозвучало из динамика. Голос принадлежал капитану Вести, командиру отряда, исследующего среднюю палубу. "Да не дрейфь, у нас все хорошо, не единого происшествия! И вам желаю того же!"

"Ha ha, I got you, old girl!" boomed a voice from the speaker. It belonged to Captain Vesti, the commander of the unit exploring the middle deck. "Don't panic, we're all good here, not a thing to report! I hope where you are is just as uneventful!"
languages.original_text: "Ха-ха, подловил тебя, старушка!" — прозвучало из динамика. Голос принадлежал капитану Вести, командиру отряда, исследующего среднюю палубу. "Да не дрейфь, у нас все хорошо, не единого происшествия! И вам желаю того же!"

traits.locale_text: "Ha ha, I got you, old girl!" boomed a voice from the speaker. It belonged to Captain Vesti, the commander of the unit exploring the middle deck. "Don't panic, we're all good here, not a thing to report! I hope where you are is just as uneventful!"

"Ha ha, I got you, old girl!" boomed a voice from the speaker. It belonged to Captain Vesti, the commander of the unit exploring the middle deck. "Don't panic, we're all good here, not a thing to report! I hope where you are is just as uneventful!"

"Ha ha, I got you, old girl!" boomed a voice from the speaker. It belonged to Captain Vesti, the commander of the unit exploring the middle deck. "Don't panic, we're all good here, not a thing to report! I hope where you are is just as uneventful!"

"Ha ha, I got you, old girl!" boomed a voice from the speaker. It belonged to Captain Vesti, the commander of the unit exploring the middle deck. "Don't panic, we're all good here, not a thing to report! I hope where you are is just as uneventful!"

languages.text: «¡Ja, ja! ¡Te he pillado, vieja amiga!», retumbó el altavoz. Era el capitán Vesti, responsable de la unidad que exploraba las cubiertas centrales, el que hablaba. «Que no cunda el pánico, ¡aquí va todo bien y no hay nada que declarar! ¡Espero que vuestra sección sea igual de aburrida!».
languages.original_text: "Ha ha, I got you, old girl!" boomed a voice from the speaker. It belonged to Captain Vesti, the commander of the unit exploring the middle deck. "Don't panic, we're all good here, not a thing to report! I hope where you are is just as uneventful!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Ja, ja! ¡Te he pillado, vieja amiga!», retumbó el altavoz. Era el capitán Vesti, responsable de la unidad que exploraba las cubiertas centrales, el que hablaba. «Que no cunda el pánico, ¡aquí va todo bien y no hay nada que declarar! ¡Espero que vuestra sección sea igual de aburrida!».

languages.text: “哈哈哈，被我吓了一跳吧，老姑娘！”扬声器中传来了维斯提上尉的声音，他的小队目前正在探索中层甲板。“别慌，这边一切正常，没有什么需要报告的事情！希望你那边也一切顺利！”
languages.original_text: "Ha ha, I got you, old girl!" boomed a voice from the speaker. It belonged to Captain Vesti, the commander of the unit exploring the middle deck. "Don't panic, we're all good here, not a thing to report! I hope where you are is just as uneventful!"

traits.locale_text: “哈哈哈，被我吓了一跳吧，老姑娘！”扬声器中传来了维斯提上尉的声音，他的小队目前正在探索中层甲板。“别慌，这边一切正常，没有什么需要报告的事情！希望你那边也一切顺利！”

languages.text: 「ははは、かかったね、お嬢さん！」スピーカーから声が響き渡った。それは中層デッキを探索する部隊の司令、ヴェスティ中隊長の声だった。「落ち着いてくれ。こっちはみんなピンピンしてる。報告するようなことはない！そっちも同じように平穏であることを願っているよ！」
languages.original_text: "Ha ha, I got you, old girl!" boomed a voice from the speaker. It belonged to Captain Vesti, the commander of the unit exploring the middle deck. "Don't panic, we're all good here, not a thing to report! I hope where you are is just as uneventful!"

traits.locale_text: 「ははは、かかったね、お嬢さん！」スピーカーから声が響き渡った。それは中層デッキを探索する部隊の司令、ヴェスティ中隊長の声だった。「落ち着いてくれ。こっちはみんなピンピンしてる。報告するようなことはない！そっちも同じように平穏であることを願っているよ！」

languages.text: "Ha ha, ich hab Euch drangekriegt, altes Mädchen!", polterte eine Stimme aus dem Lautsprecher. Sie gehörte Captain Vesti, dem Commander der Einheit, die das mittlere Deck erkundete. "Keine Panik, uns geht's gut, es gibt nichts zu berichten! Hoffentlich ist bei Euch genauso wenig los!"
languages.original_text: "Ha ha, I got you, old girl!" boomed a voice from the speaker. It belonged to Captain Vesti, the commander of the unit exploring the middle deck. "Don't panic, we're all good here, not a thing to report! I hope where you are is just as uneventful!"

traits.locale_text: "Ha ha, ich hab Euch drangekriegt, altes Mädchen!", polterte eine Stimme aus dem Lautsprecher. Sie gehörte Captain Vesti, dem Commander der Einheit, die das mittlere Deck erkundete. "Keine Panik, uns geht's gut, es gibt nichts zu berichten! Hoffentlich ist bei Euch genauso wenig los!"

languages.text: « Ha ha, je t'ai bien eue, ma vieille ! » s'exclama la voix. C'était celle du capitaine Vesti, le commandant de l'unité qui explorait le pont intermédiaire. « Pas de panique ! Tout va bien ici, rien à signaler. J'espère que c'est pareil de ton côté ! »
languages.original_text: "Ha ha, I got you, old girl!" boomed a voice from the speaker. It belonged to Captain Vesti, the commander of the unit exploring the middle deck. "Don't panic, we're all good here, not a thing to report! I hope where you are is just as uneventful!"

traits.locale_text: « Ha ha, je t'ai bien eue, ma vieille ! » s'exclama la voix. C'était celle du capitaine Vesti, le commandant de l'unité qui explorait le pont intermédiaire. « Pas de panique ! Tout va bien ici, rien à signaler. J'espère que c'est pareil de ton côté ! »

languages.text: "Hahaha, seni iyi kekledim! Ya yaşlı cadı." Hoparlörden yankılanmaya devam eden ses, orta güverteyi keşfeden birimin komutanı Yüzbaşı Vesti'nindi. "Telaşa kapılmayın, hepimizin keyfi tıkırında! Rapor verilecek tek bir olay yaşanmadı! Umarım orada da işler yolundadır!"
languages.original_text: "Ha ha, I got you, old girl!" boomed a voice from the speaker. It belonged to Captain Vesti, the commander of the unit exploring the middle deck. "Don't panic, we're all good here, not a thing to report! I hope where you are is just as uneventful!"

traits.locale_text: Hoparlörden yankılanan ses ekledi: "Hahaha, seni iyi kekledim! Haksız mıyım yaşlı cadı?" Ses, orta güverteyi keşfeden birimin komutanı Yüzbaşı Vesti'nin sesiydi. "Telaşa kapılmayın, hepimizin keyfi tıkırında! Rapor verilecek tek bir olay yaşanmadı! Umarım sizin takımın da işleri yolunda gidiyordur!"
